Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: The environmental violation report describes an incident involving the illegal dumping of hazardous waste materials. Specifically, the violation pertains to the improper disposal of chemical-filled drums in a forested area near a local water source. The drums were found to contain a mixture of toxic substances, including heavy metals and industrial solvents. The contaminants pose a significant threat to the surrounding ecosystem and the health of the local community if not properly contained and remediated.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
